That One Time I Moved to Denver

Keith and I just moved into a house. Together. Big steps people, big steps. We had been doing a ridiculous amount of commuting just to feed our addiction to each other. I would take the bus to Denver and spend the night at his place, and then he would come to Boulder in the morning and go to work. Moab & the Canyonlands 1/2 Marathon

This past weekend, I was fortunate enough to participate in the 40th annual Canyonlands Half Marathon in Moab, Utah. I ran this race last year, and it was my first time hanging out in Moab, so I couldn’t resist coming back for round two!
